content.raw:
We could go either way. I removed it for the sake of conciseness, but I'm not married to the change.

If we put it back in, then all class functions will have abbreviated briefs as well. For some classes, this can dramatically increase the size of the function listing.

Try changing `BRIEF_MEMBER_DESC` to `Yes` in `gazebo.in` to see what it's like with briefs.
content.html:
We could go either way. I removed it for the sake of conciseness, but I'm not married to the change.

If we put it back in, then all class functions will have abbreviated briefs as well. For some classes, this can dramatically increase the size of the function listing.

Try changing BRIEF_MEMBER_DESC to Yes in gazebo.in to see what it's like with briefs.
